description: Contents: Isaac Israeli, Kitāb al-Ustuquṣṣāt, translated by Abraham ben Samuel ha-Levi ibn Ḥasday as Sefer yesodot(ff. 1-56). Fragment of a commentary on Pseudo-Aristotle's De Plantis, possibly by Averroës (ff. 57-67).
title: Philosophical texts
author: Israeli, Isaac
translator: ibn Hasday, Abraham ben Samuel ha-Levi
